segments.en: “Mendicants, a crow has ten bad qualities.

segments.pli: Dhaṃsī ca, pagabbho ca, tintiṇo ca, mahagghaso ca, luddo ca, akāruṇiko ca, dubbalo ca, oravitā ca, muṭṭhassati ca, necayiko ca—
segments.en: They’re rude and impudent, gluttonous and voracious, cruel and pitiless, weak and raucous, unmindful and acquisitive.

segments.pli: imehi kho, bhikkhave, dasahi asaddhammehi samannāgato kāko.
segments.en: A crow has these ten bad qualities.

segments.pli: Evamevaṃ kho, bhikkhave, dasahi asaddhammehi samannāgato pāpabhikkhu.
segments.en: In the same way, a bad mendicant has these ten bad qualities.

segments.pli: Dhaṃsī ca, pagabbho ca, tintiṇo ca, mahagghaso ca, luddo ca, akāruṇiko ca, dubbalo ca, oravitā ca, muṭṭhassati ca, necayiko ca—
segments.en: They’re rude and impudent, gluttonous and voracious, cruel and pitiless, weak and raucous, unmindful and acquisitive.

segments.pli: imehi kho, bhikkhave, dasahi asaddhammehi samannāgato pāpabhikkhū”ti.
segments.en: A bad mendicant has these ten bad qualities.”

sections.title: “Mendicants, a crow has ten bad qualities.

suttaplex.blurb: A bad monk has ten bad qualities, like a crow.
